title: Somizi gives Mohale 100 roses to celebrate 100 hours of marriage
text:
Somizi gives Mohale 100 roses to celebrate 100 hours of marriage share this

Johannesburg – Somizi gifted Mohale a rose for every hour they've been married, and it's the most romantic gesture ever.

The couple tied the knot this past weekend in a lavish wedding put together by popular events planner Maureen "Nono" Skosana.

Guests like Bonang Matheba and Pearl Thusi were in attendance, and Somizi and Mohale had five outfit changes throughout the event.

Sharing an Instagram post on Tuesday, Mohale was pictured with a bouquet of 100 red roses.

"Bae came by my office to give me a hundred roses for a hundred hours of being his Husband. @somizi You're amazing!" he captioned the pic.
description: The couple tied the knot in a lavish wedding put together by popular events planner Maureen "Nono" Skosana.
